upgrades.description: When the Pokémon scores a goal, its max HP increases by 100.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its max HP increases by 150.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its max HP increases by 200.
When the Pokémon is not combat, it is granted a shield that nullifies Sp. Atk damage equal to 9% of its max HP.
When the Pokémon is not combat, it is granted a shield that nullifies Sp. Atk damage equal to 12% of its max HP.
When the Pokémon is not combat, it is granted a shield that nullifies Sp. Atk damage equal to 15% of its max HP.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its Attack increases by 6.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its Attack increases by 9.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its Attack increases by 12.
When the Pokémon uses its Unite Move, that Pokémon and the nearby ally Pokémon with the lowest HP are each granted a shield equal to 20% of their max HP.
When the Pokémon uses its Unite Move, that Pokémon and the nearby ally Pokémon with the lowest HP are each granted a shield equal to 30% of their max HP.
When the Pokémon uses its Unite Move, that Pokémon and the nearby ally Pokémon with the lowest HP are each granted a shield equal to 40% of their max HP.
Adds a minimum of 40 damage to moves when they hit. The higher the Pokémon's Sp. Atk is, the more this additional damage is increased.
Adds a minimum of 50 damage to moves when they hit. The higher the Pokémon's Sp. Atk is, the more this additional damage is increased.
Adds a minimum of 60 damage to moves when they hit. The higher the Pokémon's Sp. Atk is, the more this additional damage is increased.
After the Pokémon uses its Unite Move, the damage the Pokémon deals is increased by 7% for a short time.
After the Pokémon uses its Unite Move, the damage the Pokémon deals is increased by 14% for a short time.
After the Pokémon uses its Unite Move, the damage the Pokémon deals is increased by 21% for a short time.

While the Pokémon has the fewest Exp. Points on its team, it gains 2 more Exp. Points per second. In addition, when a nearby teammate defeats a wild Pokémon, that teammate gains slightly more Exp. Points.

While the Pokémon has the fewest Exp. Points on its team, it gains 3 more Exp. Points per second. In addition, when a nearby teammate defeats a wild Pokémon, that teammate gains slightly more Exp. Points.

While the Pokémon has the fewest Exp. Points on its team, it gains 4 more Exp. Points per second. In addition, when a nearby teammate defeats a wild Pokémon, that teammate gains slightly more Exp. Points.
Increases movement speed by 10% when the Pokémon is not in combat.
Increases movement speed by 15% when the Pokémon is not in combat.
Increases movement speed by 20% when the Pokémon is not in combat.
When the Pokémon drops to low HP, then each second for three seconds, it recovers 8% of the HP it had lost.
When the Pokémon drops to low HP, then each second for three seconds, it recovers 11% of the HP it had lost.
When the Pokémon drops to low HP, then each second for three seconds, it recovers 14% of the HP it had lost.
When the Pokémon is not in combat, it recovers 1% of its max HP every second.
When the Pokémon is not in combat, it recovers 1.5% of its max HP every second.
When the Pokémon is not in combat, it recovers 2% of its max HP every second.
When basic attacks hit, the damage is increased by 1% of the opposing Pokémon's remaining HP.
When basic attacks hit, the damage is increased by 2% of the opposing Pokémon's remaining HP.
When basic attacks hit, the damage is increased by 3% of the opposing Pokémon's remaining HP.

After this Pokémon uses a move, a minimum of 10 damage is added to its next basic attack. The higher the Pokémon's attack is, the more this additional damage is increased. When this item is held by a melee Pokémon, this additional damage also decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon for a short time.

After this Pokémon uses a move, a minimum of 15 damage is added to its next basic attack. The higher the Pokémon's attack is, the more this additional damage is increased. When this item is held by a melee Pokémon, this additional damage also decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon for a short time.

After this Pokémon uses a move, a minimum of 20 damage is added to its next basic attack. The higher the Pokémon's attack is, the more this additional damage is increased. When this item is held by a melee Pokémon, this additional damage also decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon for a short time.
When the Pokémon receives a certain amount of damage, damage is dealt to nearby opposing Pokémon equal to 3% of those Pokémon's max HP.
When the Pokémon receives a certain amount of damage, damage is dealt to nearby opposing Pokémon equal to 4% of those Pokémon's max HP.
When the Pokémon receives a certain amount of damage, damage is dealt to nearby opposing Pokémon equal to 5% of those Pokémon's max HP.
Increases the damage of basic attack critical hits. The higher the Pokémon's Attack, the more this damage increases.
Increases the damage of basic attack critical hits. The higher the Pokémon's Attack, the more this damage increases.
Increases the damage of basic attack critical hits. The higher the Pokémon's Attack, the more this damage increases.
While the Pokémon is attempting to score a goal, it is granted a shield equal to 5% of its max HP and its goals cannot be interrupted while it is shielded.
While the Pokémon is attempting to score a goal, it is granted a shield equal to 7.5% of its max HP and its goals cannot be interrupted while it is shielded.
While the Pokémon is attempting to score a goal, it is granted a shield equal to 10% of its max HP and its goals cannot be interrupted while it is shielded.
When the Pokémon hits with a move, it recovers a minimum of 45 HP. The higher the Pokémon's Sp. Atk, the more HP it recovers.
When the Pokémon hits with a move, it recovers a minimum of 60 HP. The higher the Pokémon's Sp. Atk, the more HP it recovers.
When the Pokémon hits with a move, it recovers a minimum of 75 HP. The higher the Pokémon's Sp. Atk, the more HP it recovers.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its Sp. Atk increases by 8.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its Sp. Atk increases by 12.
When the Pokémon scores a goal, its Sp. Atk increases by 16.
Increases the Pokémon's Attack for a short time by a minimum of 2% when the Pokémon receives damage. This increase grows larger the more times damage is received.
Increases the Pokémon's Attack for a short time by a minimum of 2.5% when the Pokémon receives damage. This increase grows larger the more times damage is received.
Increases the Pokémon's Attack for a short time by a minimum of 3% when the Pokémon receives damage. This increase grows larger the more times damage is received.
Increases Sp. Atk by 3%.
Increases Sp. Atk by 5%.
Increases Sp. Atk by 7%.
